toolingEntityParticle.InlineHelpText: When Direct Purchasing is active, an Item Vendor record for a Primary Vendor is required for PO Lines to be auto-created. If on the Product Group/Product record ‘Auto PO-Use Item Vendor PO Header’ is checked, an existing PO needs to be referenced here.

toolingEntityParticle.Label: Default Qty Ordered
toolingEntityParticle.Name: rstk__poitemvend_dltqtyord__c

toolingEntityParticle.InlineHelpText: The default expense account associated with the PO division. Used for indirect items and services only. Defaults from the General Expense Account on the Accounts tab of the Division Master. May be overwritten on the Item Vendor record.
toolingEntityParticle.Label: Expense Account
toolingEntityParticle.Name: rstk__poitemvend_expenseacct__c

It is only used for indirect material and services and is an expense account (and really plays only a supporting role in the initialization of the Expense Account for indirect material and service items for reqs and purchase order lines). (DD)</description> <escapeMarkup>false</escapeMarkup> <externalId>false</externalId> <inlineHelpText>The default expense account associated with the PO division. Used for indirect items and services only. Defaults from the General Expense Account on the Accounts tab of the Division Master. toolingEntityParticle.InlineHelpText: When checked, the GL Expense Account entered in the next field will be used on PO's placed with this vendor. If unchecked, the default from the division master is used.
toolingEntityParticle.Label: Expense Account Override Indicator
toolingEntityParticle.Name: rstk__poitemvend_expenseacctovrind__c

toolingEntityParticle.InlineHelpText: When checked, indicates that this item is inactive.
toolingEntityParticle.Label: Inactive Indicator
toolingEntityParticle.Name: rstk__poitemvend_inactive__c

toolingEntityParticle.InlineHelpText: This is the price in the vendor's currency recorded from the last PO creation. It is displayed on the PO line when the PO Price Option is 'Use Last Price'. The option defaults from the PO CC, but may be overwritten on this Item Vendor Master.
toolingEntityParticle.Label: Last PO Price
toolingEntityParticle.Name: rstk__poitemvend_lastpoprice__c

toolingEntityParticle.InlineHelpText: Checked, the system uses the Vendor Loc ID (next field) to backflush components. If unchecked, the system uses theDefault Rcvg locations (tagged as 'Backflush Location') on the CC or Inv Item Mstr. Components always backflush from the PARENT loc id .
toolingEntityParticle.Label: Override Backflush Loc ID
toolingEntityParticle.Name: rstk__poitemvend_ovrbackflushind__c

toolingEntityParticle.InlineHelpText: This field designates the Override Purchase Agreement that is to be used for pricing on Purchase Order Lines that carry this Item-Vendor Combination.

toolingEntityParticle.InlineHelpText: The User defined price in the vendor's currency displayed on the PO line when PO Price Option is 'Enter New Price'. It may be overwritten on the PO line.
toolingEntityParticle.Label: PO Price
toolingEntityParticle.Name: rstk__poitemvend_poprice__c

toolingEntityParticle.InlineHelpText: Options: Use Last Price or Enter New Price. This value determines how the price is set when a purchase order is created.
toolingEntityParticle.Label: PO Price Option
toolingEntityParticle.Name: rstk__poitemvend_popriceind__c
toolingEntityParticle.Metadata: <CustomField xmlns="http://soap.sforce.com/2006/04/metadata" > <fullName>rstk__poitemvend__c.rstk__poitemvend_popriceind__c</fullName> <caseSensitive>false</caseSensitive> <deprecated>false</deprecated> <description>Valid Values: Enter New Price (POPRICE below) – use POITEMVEND_POPRICE as the default in ‘convert req to po’ Use Last Price If ‘Enter New Price’ the Item Vendor PO Price (see below) is used. If ‘Use Last Price’ the Last PO Price is used. When a purchase order is created in ‘convert requisition to PO’, and there is no Agreement price and there is no prior PO Line on an existing Purchase Order, then the POITEMVEND_POPRICE or POITEMVEND_LASTPOPRICE will be used based on the value of this indicator. (DD)</description> <escapeMarkup>false</escapeMarkup> <externalId>false</externalId> <inlineHelpText>Options: Use Last Price or Enter New Price. This value determines how the price is set when a purchase order is created.</inlineHelpText> <isAIPredictionField>false</isAIPredictionField> <isConvertLeadDisabled>false</isConvertLeadDisabled> <isFilteringDisabled>false</isFilteringDisabled> <isNameField>false</isNameField> <isSortingDisabled>false</isSortingDisabled> <label>PO Price Option</label> <length>0</length> <populateExistingRows>false</populateExistingRows> <precision>0</precision> <relationshipOrder>0</relationshipOrder> <reparentableMasterDetail>false</reparentableMasterDetail> <required>false</required> <restrictedAdminField>false</restrictedAdminField> <scale>0</scale> <startingNumber>0</startingNumber> <stripMarkup>false</stripMarkup> <trackFeedHistory>true</trackFeedHistory> <trackHistory>true</trackHistory> <trackTrending>false</trackTrending> <translateData>false</translateData> <type>Picklist</type> <unique>false</unique> <valueSet> <restricted>false</restricted> <valueSetDefinition> <sorted>false</sorted> <value> <fullName>Enter New Price</fullName> <default>false</default> <isActive>false</isActive> <label>Enter New Price</label> </value> <value> <fullName>Use Last Price</fullName> <default>false</default> <isActive>false</isActive> <label>Use Last Price</label> </value> </valueSetDefinition> </valueSet> <visibleLines>0</visibleLines> <writeRequiresMasterRead>false</writeRequiresMasterRead></CustomField>

toolingEntityParticle.Label: Unit Freight Amount
toolingEntityParticle.Name: rstk__poitemvend_pounitfreightamt__c

toolingEntityParticle.Label: Unit Other Landed Amount
toolingEntityParticle.Name: rstk__poitemvend_pounitothamt__c

toolingEntityParticle.InlineHelpText: When selected, this is the primary vendor for the Item or Items. Only one primary vendor is allowed per item. This vendor is the default for auto-created PO's.
toolingEntityParticle.Label: Primary Vendor
toolingEntityParticle.Name: rstk__poitemvend_primeind__c

toolingEntityParticle.InlineHelpText: Optional. If entered, this is the default location that will be displayed when a PO receipt for this item is peformed.
toolingEntityParticle.Label: Receipt Location ID
toolingEntityParticle.Name: rstk__poitemvend_rcptlocid__c
toolingEntityParticle.Metadata: <CustomField xmlns="http://soap.sforce.com/2006/04/metadata" > <fullName>rstk__poitemvend__c.rstk__poitemvend_rcptlocid__c</fullName> <caseSensitive>false</caseSensitive> <deleteConstraint>SetNull</deleteConstraint> <deprecated>false</deprecated> <description>Standard Location Id from which subcontract PO Component is issued when Override Backflush Loc ID is not selected. (i.e. the value for the POITEMVEND_OVRBACKFLUSHIND = ‘F’). It is expected that the RCPTLOCID is the Receiving Location on the Company’s site. If POITEMVEND_OVRBACKFLUSHIND is true then PODMD_ISSLOCID is set to it else PODMD_ISSLOCID is set from POITEMVEND_RCPTLOCID. (DD)</description> <escapeMarkup>false</escapeMarkup> <externalId>false</externalId> <inlineHelpText>Optional. If entered, this is the default location that will be displayed when a PO receipt for this item is peformed.</inlineHelpText> <isAIPredictionField>false</isAIPredictionField> <isConvertLeadDisabled>false</isConvertLeadDisabled> <isFilteringDisabled>false</isFilteringDisabled> <isNameField>false</isNameField> <isSortingDisabled>false</isSortingDisabled> <label>Receipt Location ID</label> <length>0</length> <populateExistingRows>false</populateExistingRows> <precision>0</precision> <referenceTo>rstk__sylocid__c</referenceTo> <relationshipLabel>Item Vendor Master (Receipt Location ID)</relationshipLabel> <relationshipName>Approved_Vendors</relationshipName> <relationshipOrder>0</relationshipOrder> <reparentableMasterDetail>false</reparentableMasterDetail> <required>false</required> <restrictedAdminField>false</restrictedAdminField> <scale>0</scale> <startingNumber>0</startingNumber> <stripMarkup>false</stripMarkup> <trackFeedHistory>false</trackFeedHistory> <trackHistory>true</trackHistory> <trackTrending>false</trackTrending> <translateData>false</translateData> <type>Lookup</type> <unique>false</unique> <visibleLines>0</visibleLines> <writeRequiresMasterRead>false</writeRequiresMasterRead></CustomField>

toolingEntityParticle.Label: Receipt Location Number
toolingEntityParticle.Name: rstk__poitemvend_rcptlocnum__c

toolingEntityParticle.Label: Temp Select
toolingEntityParticle.Name: rstk__poitemvend_temp_select__c

toolingEntityParticle.Label: UOM Conversion factor
toolingEntityParticle.Name: rstk__poitemvend_umcf__c

toolingEntityParticle.InlineHelpText: When set, this value will be used rather than that on the Purchase Item. When not set, the value on the Purchase Item will be used.
toolingEntityParticle.Label: Override VAT Class

toolingEntityParticle.InlineHelpText: The Location from which the subcontract Parents' Components are issued when the Override Backflush Loc ID box is checked. Otherwise, they are issued from the PARENTs' Default Receiving Loc ID (found on CC or Inv. Item Master). Only valid on PARENT.
toolingEntityParticle.Label: Vendor Loc ID
toolingEntityParticle.Name: rstk__poitemvend_vendlocid__c
toolingEntityParticle.Metadata: <CustomField xmlns="http://soap.sforce.com/2006/04/metadata" > <fullName>rstk__poitemvend__c.rstk__poitemvend_vendlocid__c</fullName> <caseSensitive>false</caseSensitive> <deleteConstraint>SetNull</deleteConstraint> <deprecated>false</deprecated> <description>Stock Loc Id of a Stock Loc Id Master Location Id from which subcontract PO Component is issued when Override Backflush Loc ID is selected (represents a location at the vendor). The POITEMVEND_VENDLOCID must be either null or set to the POVEND_VENDLOCID associated with the POITEMVEND_VENDNO The POVEND maintenance will not allow another Vendor to have this same LOCATION ID. (DD)</description> <escapeMarkup>false</escapeMarkup> <externalId>false</externalId> <inlineHelpText>The Location from which the subcontract Parents' Components are issued when the Override Backflush Loc ID box is checked. Otherwise, they are issued from the PARENTs' Default Receiving Loc ID (found on CC or Inv. Item Master). toolingEntityParticle.InlineHelpText: Optional. If the Vendor uses a part number different from the Rootstock Part Number, it may be entered here. This part number will print on the PO in addition to the Rootstock part number.
toolingEntityParticle.Label: Vendor's Part Number
toolingEntityParticle.Name: rstk__poitemvend_vendpartno__c

toolingEntityParticle.InlineHelpText: This is the Unit of Measure in which the item will be purchased. It is defaulted from the PO commodity code.
toolingEntityParticle.Label: Unit Of Measure
toolingEntityParticle.Name: rstk__poitemvend_venduom__c
